headline: Citi Downgrades Sherwin-Williams’ (NYSE:SHW) Stock, Lowers PT
summary: The Sherwin-Williams Company (NYSE:SHW) is one of the 10 stocks that Jim Cramer and analysts are watching. On June 13, Citi analyst Patrick Cunningham downgraded the company stock to Neutral from Buy and lowered the price target to $385 from $405 due to weak housing conditions due to high mortgage rates, and delayed Fed rate […]
